name: Wolfensohn & Company
overview: Wolfensohn & Company, L.L.C. (WCLLC) is a boutique investment bank that offers financial advisory services. The company provides mergers and acquisitions, valuations, capital restructuring, and investment advisory services. It caters to corporate houses and government institutions. WCLLC was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New York, New York with additional offices in Washington, District of Columbia; London, United Kingdom; Moscow, Russia; and Singapore.
